item.title: useEffect
item.description: 001. Resources w3schools reactDev blog Syntax 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 function callback(){ // The SIDE EFFECT return() =>{ // The Cleanup of the side effect cleanup() }; } useEffect(callback[, dependencies]) callback¬†is a function that contains the side-effect logic.
